title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q001
frontText: What are the three elements of the C-I-A triad?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q002
frontText: Who is the individual responsible for assigning information classification levels to assigned information assets?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q003
frontText: Most security policies are categorized as what type?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q004
frontText: A baseline is what type of governance?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q005
frontText: What is the formula for calculating Annualized Loss Expectancy (ALE)?
backText: SLE x ARO = ALE, where SLE is the Single Loss Expectancy and ARO is the Annualized Rate of Occurrence

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q006
frontText: True or false: Risk avoidance is considered to be a general remedy for risk.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q007
frontText: True or false: Failure to implement a safeguard may result in legal liability if the cost of implementing the safeguard is less than the cost of the associated loss.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q008
frontText: A ________________ is useful in safeguard selection for determining cost-effectiveness.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q009
frontText: Data on backup media being sent by courier to an off-site storage location is known as what?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q010
frontText: Which U.S. government data classification level describes information that, if compromised, could cause serious damage to national security?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q011
frontText: Which U.S. government data classification level describes information that, if compromised, could cause grave damage to national security?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q012
frontText: Name three factors that are used to determine data classification.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q013
frontText: What is the main reason for establishing an asset classification program?
backText: It isn’t practical to protect all data equally.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q014
frontText: A type of cipher that replaces bits, characters, or character blocks with alternate bits, characters, or character blocks to produce cipher text is known as a ______________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q015
frontText: The Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) is based on what symmetric key algorithm?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q016
frontText: Name the four main components of a Public Key Infrastructure (PKI).
backText: Certificate Authority (CA), Registration Authority (RA), Repository, Archive

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q017
frontText: The practice of regularly transferring personnel to different positions or departments within an organization is known as ___________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q018
frontText: Name three types of general-purpose controls.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q019
frontText: Violation reports and audit trails are examples of what type of control?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q020
frontText: “A user cannot deny an action” describes the concept of _____________

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q021
frontText: Authentication can be based on any combination of what three factors?
backText: Something you know, something you have, something you are

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q022
frontText: In biometric systems, what is a False Accept Rate (Type II) error?
backText: Unauthorized users are incorrectly granted access.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q023
frontText: Name two protocols that can be used to implement one-time passwords.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q024
frontText: Which PPP authentication protocol transmits passwords in clear text?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q025
frontText: Name three methods of attack against access control systems.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q026
frontText: Sensitivity labels are a fundamental component of which type of access control system?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q027
frontText: True or false: Bell-LaPadula, Biba, and Clark-Wilson all address availability issues.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q028
frontText: A data network that operates across a large geographic area defines what type of network?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q029
frontText: The process of wrapping protocol information from one layer in the data section of another layer describes .

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q030
frontText: The LLC and MAC are sublayers of which OSI model layer?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q031
frontText: The Ethernet protocol is defined at what layer of the OSI model and in which IEEE standard?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q032
frontText: Name four examples of packet-switched WAN protocols.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q033
frontText: 192.167.4.1 is an example of what class of IP address?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q034
frontText: Name the four layers of the TCP/IP Protocol Model.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q035
frontText: What type of firewall architecture employs external and internal routers, as well as a bastion host?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q036
frontText: Name three VPN protocol standards.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q037
frontText: What type of network attack sends TCP packets from a spoofed source address with the SYN bit set?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q038
frontText: Masquerading is a ___________ technique.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q039
frontText: Viruses, rootkits, and Trojan horses are broadly defined as ______________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q040
frontText: Antimalware software that watches for anomalous behavior uses what technique?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q041
frontText: A developer, suspecting that he may be fired soon, modifies an important program that will corrupt payroll files long after he is gone. The developer has created a _________________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q042
frontText: A SYN flood is an example of what type of attack?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q043
frontText: The process of reviewing and approving proposed changes to systems is known as ________________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q044
frontText: A system that accumulates knowledge by observing events’ inputs and outcomes is known as a ________________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q045
frontText: The logic present in an object is known as a ____________ .

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q046
frontText: The restricted environment that Java applets occupy is known as a _______________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q047
frontText: An attacker has placed a URL on a website that, if clicked, will cause malicious JavaScript to execute in victims’ browsers. This attack is known as a ___________ attack.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q048
frontText: Name three asymmetric key systems based on discrete logarithms.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q049
frontText: Which Internet specification provides secure e-commerce by using symmetric key systems, asymmetric key systems, and dual signatures?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q050
frontText: The minimum number of SAs required for a two-way IPSec session between two communicating hosts using both AH and ESP is ____________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q051
frontText: An IPsec SA consists of what three parameters to uniquely identify it in an IPsec session?
backText: Destination IP address, Security Protocol ID (SPID), Security Parameter Index (SPI)

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q052
frontText: Name the four CPU operating states.
backText: Operating (or run), problem (or application), supervisory, wait

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q053
frontText: A computer system that alternates execution of multiple subprograms on a single processor describes what type of system?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q054
frontText: An address used as the origin for calculating other addresses describes ________________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q055
frontText: What are the four main functions of the operating system?
backText: Process management, I/O device management, memory management, file management

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q056
frontText: The total combination of protection mechanisms within a computer system (including hardware, firmware, and software) that’s responsible for enforcing a security policy defines a ______________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q057
frontText: A system that continues to operate following the failure of a network component describes which type of system?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q058
frontText: What are the four basic control requirements identified in the Orange Book?
backText: Discretionary access control, mandatory access control, object reuse, labels

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q059
frontText: The purpose of session management in a web application is to ________________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q060
frontText: Which ITSEC classification level is equivalent to TCSEC level B3?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q061
frontText: The two types of host or network intrusion detection are ______________ and ________________ .

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q062
frontText: Wardriving and port scanning are examples of ___________ tests.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q063
frontText: A third-party inspection of a system is known as ________________ .

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q064
frontText: What is a primary technical concern with long-term audit log retention?
backText: Whether any tape or disk drives will be available to read the media

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q065
frontText: What is the required operating state of a network interface on a system running a sniffer?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q066
frontText: Filling a system’s hard drive so that it can no longer record data is a type of __________ attack.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q067
frontText: ____________ monitoring records every key press and mouse movement on a system.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q068
frontText: True or false: A signature-based IDS generally reports a high number of false positives.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q069
frontText: What is the longest period of time that a business can survive without a critical function?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q070
frontText: What are two types of risk analysis?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q071
frontText: What is the purpose of a Business Impact Assessment (BIA)?
backText: To describe the impact that an event or disaster will have on business operations

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q072
frontText: The decision whether to purchase an emergency generator should be based on the _________________ of electrical power outages.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q073
frontText: Name four Wi-Fi access point infrastructure modes of operation.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q074
frontText: A system used to monitor and control end-user access to cloud-based services is known as a ________________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q075
frontText: An alternative information-processing facility where all systems, patches, and data are mirrored from live production systems is known as a _______________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q076
frontText: Name five types of attacks against voice communication systems.
backText: Identity fraud, toll fraud, eavesdropping, denial-of-service (DoS), Spam over Internet Telephony (SPIT)

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q077
frontText: The most extensive type of disaster recovery plan test is ______________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q078
frontText: Name three types of possible damages in a civil case.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q079
frontText: Name five protocols that can be used to secure email communication.
backText: SMTP over TLS, S/MIME, MOSS, PEM, PGP

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q080
frontText: Name four types of intellectual property.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q081
frontText: PCI DSS is applicable to organizations that ______________________.
backText: transmit, process, or store payment card information

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q082
frontText: To be admissible in a court of law, evidence must be ________________________.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q083
frontText: What term describes the legal evidence-gathering technique of luring an individual toward certain evidence after that individual has already committed a crime?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q084
frontText: In a civil case, the court may issue an order, known as a _________________ , allowing a law-enforcement official to seize specific evidence.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q085
frontText: When should management be notified of a computer crime?
backText: As soon as the crime is detected

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q086
frontText: Name the three elements of the fire triangle necessary for a fire to burn.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q087
frontText: Electrical fires are classified as what type of fire and use what extinguishing methods?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q088
frontText: A prolonged drop in voltage describes what electrical anomaly?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q089
frontText: What type of cabling should be used below raised floors and above drop ceilings?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q090
frontText: To deter casual trespassers, fencing should be a minimum height of ______________ feet.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q091
frontText: Name three types of intrusion detection systems used for physical security.
backText: Photoelectric sensors, dry contact switches, motion detectors

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q092
frontText: What type of water sprinkler system initially has no water present in the pipes and, at activation, delivers a large volume of water?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q093
frontText: Portable CO<sub>2</sub> fire extinguishers are classified as what type of extinguishing system?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q094
frontText: Name a type of extinguishing agent that fights fires by separating the elements of the fire triangle rather than simply removing one element.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q095
frontText: The simple integrity property and star integrity property are defined in which integrity model?

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q096
frontText: A ________________ model ensures that the actions of different objects and subjects aren’t seen by (and don’t interfere with) other objects and subjects on the same system.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q097
frontText: The Clark-Wilson integrity model is based on the concept of a ___________, in which a transaction is sufficiently ordered and controlled that it maintains internal and external consistency.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q098
frontText: A ______________ conveys information by altering stored system data.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q099
frontText: A ___________ conveys information by altering a system resource’s performance or timing.

title: 505815 CISSP FD6E_FC_Q100
frontText: The ____________ protocol is used to facilitate user authentication across systems and among organizations through the exchange of authentication and authorization information among organizations.
